name: Scared Henry
description:
Henry is afraid of heights. Suddenly he wakes up in great heights, in the sky!

Now henry tries to find all the keys needed for the baloon he found, to escape and get back to the ground. While doing this, weird things happen. There are spikes all around and also there are some magic cubes, which transform some spikes to jelly spikes.

Henry uses those slime/jelly spikes to go through them or just to jump higher with their help, just like a trampoline! Just like this, those spikes are becoming friends when they are in their slimy state ;)

Use WASD to move and SPACE to jump.

You have to get all the keys to use the baloon at the end of ever level. (There are 5 Levels)

This game was made for the Thankjam with the theme: "Foes become friends"

This is the first game I made in Unity.
